languages.text: {n}Мешочек с прахом начинает светиться и пульсировать в ваших руках. Напитавшись смертью и страданиями жертв, павших от вашей руки, он стремится вырваться наружу.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bag of dust begins to glow and pulsate in your hands. Sated with the deaths and torment of your victims, it now yearns to be let loose.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The bag of dust begins to glow and pulsate in your hands. Sated with the deaths and torment of your victims, it now yearns to be let loose.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le sac de poussière commence à briller et à palpiter entre vos mains. Rassasiée par la mort et les souffrances de vos victimes, elle souhaite à présent être libérée.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bag of dust begins to glow and pulsate in your hands. Sated with the deaths and torment of your victims, it now yearns to be let loose.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le sac de poussière commence à briller et à palpiter entre vos mains. Rassasiée par la mort et les souffrances de vos victimes, elle souhaite à présent être libérée.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这袋魔尘在你的手中发出光芒，开始搏动。它已经吸收了足够的死亡与折磨，渴望从袋子里冲出来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bag of dust begins to glow and pulsate in your hands. Sated with the deaths and torment of your victims, it now yearns to be let loose.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这袋魔尘在你的手中发出光芒，开始搏动。它已经吸收了足够的死亡与折磨，渴望从袋子里冲出来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}粉塵の入った袋があなたの手の中で光り、脈動し始めた。あなたの犠牲者の死と苦痛で十分に満たされた今、その袋は解き放たれることを強く望んでいる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bag of dust begins to glow and pulsate in your hands. Sated with the deaths and torment of your victims, it now yearns to be let loose.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}粉塵の入った袋があなたの手の中で光り、脈動し始めた。あなたの犠牲者の死と苦痛で十分に満たされた今、その袋は解き放たれることを強く望んでいる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Beutel mit Staub in deinen Händen beginnt zu glühen und zu pulsieren. Gesättigt mit den Toden und den Qualen deiner Opfer sehnt er sich danach, freigelassen zu werden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bag of dust begins to glow and pulsate in your hands. Sated with the deaths and torment of your victims, it now yearns to be let loose.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Beutel mit Staub in deinen Händen beginnt zu glühen und zu pulsieren. Gesättigt mit den Toden und den Qualen deiner Opfer sehnt er sich danach, freigelassen zu werden.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La bolsa de polvo empieza a brillar y palpitar en tus manos. Saciado con las muertes y el tormento de tus víctimas, ahora ansía ser liberado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bag of dust begins to glow and pulsate in your hands. Sated with the deaths and torment of your victims, it now yearns to be let loose.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Toz kesesi parıldamaya başlıyor, elindeyken bir nabız misali çarpıyor. Kurbanlarının işkencesi ve ölümüyle tatmin olmuş, serbest kalmayı arzuluyor.{/n}
